explains: n. 移动装置；搬移东西者

sentences.en: The role of phase shifter is signal phase shift from another perspective.
sentences.cn: 移相器地感化是将旌旗灯号地相位挪动一个角度。

sentences.en: Phase shifter is widely applied in the system of communication and radar.
sentences.cn: 移相器在通信、雷达等系统中有着广泛的应用。

sentences.en: So the high performance phase shifter has vital function in these systems.
sentences.cn: 因此高性能的移相器在这些系统中起着至关重要的作用。
